title: Why is everyone not acknowledging that this champion is the best URF champ?
body:
evelyn is clearly the hash slinging slasher of URF. nuff said

she kills people before they can even unleash their first spell

replies.body: Yeah...as a {{champion:57}} player: I'm gonna have to disagree with you.

Agreed.

What's that? You wanna run away? TWISTED ADVANCE all over your face to the point where you can never ever move ever again!

What's that? You wanna hid in a bush? SAPLINGS EVERYWHERE MOTHERF*CKER UH!

What's that? You wanna go toe to stump? SAP MAGIC, ICEBORN GAUNTLET, LICH BANE ALL OVER YOUR DYING DEAD BODY SON!

Maokai wins games, nuff said.

> [{quoted}](name=Aemette,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ByEqfAgd,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-04-06T20:44:08.636+0000)
>
> What's that? You wanna hid in a bush?

Me to Hec:

*ping back*
*ping back*
*ping back*
*ping DANGER*
*ping DANGER*
*ping DANGER*

Hec walks into bush...

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/HzazH6L1jPA/hqdefault.jpg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x6RVFT4TNWE

Hec: oops

/me imperial facepalm

I love how there isn't a restriction as to how many Saplings you can put down. Sure they expire in 35 seconds but man do I g o crazy about dropping them. And people just can't learn their lessons when face checking bushes. I tend to drop 3-5 saplings in a bush before I even consider hiding in it... can't be too safe with Teemos and Evelyns running around.
There is. 5. It's not even enough to kill frog at level 1.

Gonna have to second that.

Tree is the most broken champion in URF.

First hexakill in history.

Obvsly OP.
{{champion:31}} What spells?
I played this matchup against an Eve yesterday and facerolled her.
I got reported by an enemy Eve because she got SHURIMA'd and ended 4-10. She spammed the last 10 minutes CANCER AZIR YOU CANCER CANCER CANCER and then reported me. LoL.
Well, stop being cancer dammit. =)
Nope, Karthus is so op.

{{item:3157}} 
low CD zhonyas would like to have a word with you
Yeah Now lane against one. Constant q's.

interesting,  ran up to him as hecarim and beat him at lvl1
to be fair, I was hecarim i guess... lol

and proceeded to do that at pretty much every other point of the laning phase
Karthus left his house once to protect the nexus, Lucian and Shaco made sure he wouldn't try it again.
at some point when I got so ahead as karthus I just never left the fountain and pressed me ult ever 25 seconds :l
That's what the Karthus I played against did, through it was annoying, I had enough life steal to just hit a jungle camp and fully heal. He was basically useless.

well, i also trusted that not everyone would be full health
cmon whats the rest of ymt eam doing if not fighting >.>
Dieing.

Short story, any permastun or stun + burst champion can decimate her, especially in most 1v1's. I've had no trouble with Evelynn as Leona, Twisted Fate, Syndra, or Malzahar. And that's AP Malz, for the record.
I find Maokai is pretty strong. Huge lane bully early that scales into a huge team fighting tank late. Karthus' E is pretty insane with {{item:3152}} . Too bad the damage vs champs is so weak.

{{champion:3}} Cute negative damage you got there Evelyn...
{{champion:12}} Don't mind me... i'm just nearly invincible and have more than enough cc(even after the nerfs).
{{champion:80}} For some Magic-Mandrop 1 shot action https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvK67lwHzGM
There are plenty of champions that are better than Eve, people just rarely play them(as stupid as that sounds... probably to busy complaining about how "OP" Yi is in every mode).

{{champion:131}} + {{item:3100}} 

You are basically hit with her whole combo in 0.1 sec.

The best unsung URF champion is clearly {{champion:24}}. His E makes him untouchable and he could stun whole teams with it. Then, he could just leap to a squishy, smack their face a few times, and leap back out.
i just fly around the map one shotting people with leblanc ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
cuz she's actually pretty average
every burst champion kills her even talon do it

people tend to forget that it's never gonna be a fair fight against Evelynn
the likelihood that she creeps up and instigibs you is alot more likely than you would do to her :l
{{champion:254}} Because Excessive Force wasn't already excessive enough. Seriously, if you're in URF, every other auto will have the E buff on it. Also, dashing EVERYWHERE!

I lol at this as i was playing Diana this morning vs a Eve.
I had like lest then 500 health (this was after 9th) and not under tower why recalling. She came out  of jungle(full health) and I think she hit me once before I got my W up. Then I hit with her my full combo and gone back to base. It was so funny that she could not kill me.
I personally prefer AP Shaco.  Sure it takes longer, but your target get's that nice bit of hope first.  Makes killing them that much sweeter.
{{champion:44}} permastuns/heals here would like a word with you
Malzahar.  Malzahar is why no one things Eve is the best.
